A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just read a professional review trying to justify this piece of junk addition to Star Wars by saying everyone must think it is great if it has such a big box office weekend. The writer/director obviously did a great job the review stated because how popular the film is. What are these people smoking? It has a huge box office because it is Star Wars and we have been waiting over 30 years for this. Not because it was good.
